MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH8 postcode area of Pentre Halkyn, affecting properties in Uwch Y Mor. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:00PM due to repairs required to a cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:57PM on 7th February 2021.
